verses.verse: And I saw <S%G1492><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the key <S%G2807><s%> of the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit and a great <S%G3173><s%> chain <S%G254><s%> in his hand. <S%G5495><s%>

And he laid hold <S%G2902><s%> on the dragon, <S%G1404><s%> that old <S%G744><s%> serpent, <S%G3789><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is the Devil, <S%G1228><s%> and Satan, <S%G4567><s%> and bound <S%G1210><s%> him a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%>

And cast <S%G906><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the bottomless <S%G12><s%> pit, and shut <S%G2808><s%> him up, and set <S%G4972><s%> a seal <S%G4972><s%> on him, that he should deceive <S%G4105><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> more, <S%G2089><s%> till <S%G891><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> should be fulfilled: <S%G5055><s%> and after <S%G3326><s%> that he must <S%G1163><s%> be loosed <S%G3089><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> season. <S%G5550><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> thrones, <S%G2362><s%> and they sat <S%G2523><s%> on them, and judgment <S%G2917><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to them: and I saw the souls <S%G5590><s%> of them that were beheaded <S%G3990><s%> for the witness <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and for the word <S%G3056><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and which <S%G3748><s%> had not worshipped <S%G4352><s%> the beast, <S%G2342><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> his image, <S%G1504><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> had received <S%G2983><s%> his mark <S%G5480><s%> on their foreheads, <S%G3359><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> in their hands; <S%G5495><s%> and they lived <S%G2198><s%> and reigned <S%G936><s%> with Christ <S%G5547><s%> a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

But the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the dead <S%G3498><s%> lived <S%G326><s%> not again <S%G326><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> were finished. <S%G5055><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection. <S%G386><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> and holy <S%G40><s%> is he that has <S%G2192><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> in the first <S%G4413><s%> resurrection: <S%G386><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> such <S%G5130><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power, <S%G1849><s%> but they shall be priests <S%G2409><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and shall reign <S%G936><s%> with him a thousand <S%G5507><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>
And when <S%G3752><s%> the thousand <S%G5507><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> are expired, <S%G5055><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> shall be loosed <S%G3089><s%> out of his prison, <S%G5438><s%>

And shall go <S%G1831><s%> out to deceive <S%G4105><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in the four <S%G5064><s%> quarters <S%G1137><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> Gog, <S%G1136><s%> and Magog, <S%G3098><s%> to gather <S%G4863><s%> them together <S%G4863><s%> to battle: <S%G4171><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> is as the sand <S%G285><s%> of the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And they went <S%G305><s%> up on <S%G1909><s%> the breadth <S%G4114><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and compassed <S%G2944><s%> the camp <S%G3925><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> about, <S%G2944><s%> and the beloved <S%G25><s%> city: <S%G4172><s%> and fire <S%G4442><s%> came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> out of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and devoured <S%G2719><s%> them.

And the devil <S%G1228><s%> that deceived <S%G4105><s%> them was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> and brimstone, <S%G2303><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and the false <S%G5578><s%> prophet <S%G5578><s%> are, and shall be tormented <S%G928><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and night <S%G3571><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> throne, <S%G2362><s%> and him that sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> it, from whose <S%G3739><s%> face <S%G4383><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and the heaven <S%G3772><s%> fled <S%G5343><s%> away; and there was found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> for them.

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> small <S%G3398><s%> and great, <S%G3173><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> and the books <S%G975><s%> were opened: <S%G455><s%> and another <S%G243><s%> book <S%G976><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is the book <S%G976><s%> of life: <S%G2222><s%> and the dead <S%G3498><s%> were judged <S%G2919><s%> out of those <S%G3588><s%> things which were written <S%G1125><s%> in the books, <S%G975><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to their works. <S%G2041><s%>

And the sea <S%G2281><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> up the dead <S%G3498><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in it; and death <S%G2288><s%> and hell <S%G86><s%> delivered <S%G1325><s%> up the dead <S%G3498><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were in them: and they were judged <S%G2919><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> man according <S%G2596><s%> to their works. <S%G2041><s%>

And death <S%G2288><s%> and hell <S%G86><s%> were cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the second <S%G1208><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

And whoever <S%G1536><s%> was not found <S%G2147><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> was cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the lake <S%G3041><s%> of fire. <S%G4442><s%>
